title: 21: Girl With No Job: The Crazy Beautiful Life of an Instagram Thirst Monster
itunes:title: Girl With No Job: The Crazy Beautiful Life of an Instagram Thirst Monster
description: Our first ever episode with the author is here. We are joined by Claudia Oshry, author of Girl With No Job: The Crazy Beautiful Life of an Instagram Thirst Monster. We are sitting down with Claudia to ask her all of our questions about her debut book as well as asking questions our audience has submitted. Plus, per usual, we're discussing our favorite Kindle highlights, the moral of the story, and sharing who we think should play each character in a movie or TV adaptation of this book in our Hollywood Treatment segment. Enjoy! Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com The overall Readheads Rating for Girl With No Job is 4.625 stars.
